projects.title: Scenario Planning MVP (Airflow + MinIO)
projects.tagline: Reproducible what-if scenario planning pipeline: deterministic baseline -> scenario knobs -> solver outputs with auditable run artifacts.
highlights: Three scenario knobs implemented: demand, variable cost, logistics cost scaling.
Published outputs include fact_production, kpi_total, kpi_cost_breakdown, plus run metadata.

projects.title: Discrete-Event Simulation of Production Flow (SimPy)
projects.tagline: Digital twin of a circular production line (forward + reverse flow) with KPI exports and a Dash dashboard for bottleneck/cost/sustainability analysis.
highlights: End-to-end model: arrivals, processing, queues, resources.
Run artifacts saved per run + Dash dashboard explorer.
Used insights to guide improvement and planning.

projects.title: Sensitivity Analysis for MILP (Optuna / SALib / SHAP)
projects.tagline: Work in progress: sensitivity workflow for MILP to rank KPI drivers and convert findings into actionable scenario knobs.
highlights: Global sensitivity workflow for MILP using sampling + surrogate models.
Feature importance to identify cost/capacity drivers affecting KPIs.
Turns analysis into actionable scenarios (e.g., demand up triggers overtime).

projects.title: Production Network Configuration (MILP with Gurobi)
projects.tagline: Work in progress: MILP model for production network capability/capacity and investment planning under constraints.
highlights: Structured sets/parameters → solve → export results and KPIs.
Focus on robust input checks and traceable outputs.
Designed to evolve into scenario comparison and dashboards.
